thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Spok Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $1.07

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Spok Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $1.07
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Spok Holdings Inc:
* SPOK REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 OPERATING RESULTS; TOTAL REVENUE GROWTH FOR THIRD SEQUENTIAL QUARTER
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $1.07 * Q4 REVENUE $43.8 MILLION VERSUS $44.2 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 EXCLUDING ITEMS * AUTHORIZES $10 MILLION STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM * EXPECTS TOTAL REVENUE TO RANGE FROM $161 MILLION TO $177 MILLION FOR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
